SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.PartnerType , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, M1.Name as PartnerTypeName , BB.BizName , BB.RepName , BB.BizNo
FROM dbo.TPartner AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B1.PartnerID , B1.BusinessID , B2.Name as BizName , B2.RepName as RepName , B2.BizNo as BizNo FROM dbo.TPartnerBusiness B1 INNER JOIN dbo.TBusiness B2 ON B1.BusinessID = B2.ID WHERE B1.StartDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE()) AND ISNULL(B1.EndDate, GETDATE()) > DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE()) ) BB ON AA.ID = BB.PartnerID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PartnerType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'PartnerType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.PartnerType = #PatnerType#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartner AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartner ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, PartnerType, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #PartnerType#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartner SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , PartnerType = #PartnerType# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description#
WHERE ID = #ID#
